title: Russian, Western Diplomats Clash at G-20 Gathering in Bali
sub_head: Tensions over the war in Ukraine dominated the meetings, with Moscow’s foreign minister claiming ‘frenzied Russophobia’
body:
NUSA DUA, Indonesia—A gathering of top diplomats from leading world economies descended into acrimony Friday as Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov walked out of a meeting early in the day and accused Western nations of using the platform to target Moscow over the war in Ukraine.
"There is only frenzied Russophobia,” Mr. Lavrov told reporters on the sidelines of the meeting that was attended by foreign ministers of the Group of 20 nations. Western countries “used the G-20 for purposes other than those for which it was created—this is obvious,” he said.
